battlesys.analysis
Class AnalysisPlayer

java.lang.Object
  battlesys.Player
      battlesys.analysis.AnalysisPlayer

public class AnalysisPlayer
extends Player

A concrete implementation for the Player, with simple move usage implemented. This is used for testing and balancing purposes.

Constructor Detail

AnalysisPlayer

public AnalysisPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String teamName,
                      int point,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> buyAtkNames)
               throws InvalidMoveNameException,
                      NotEnoughPointsException,
                      UnbuyableMoveException
Generate a player

Parameters:
name - Name of the player
teamName - Team name of the player. Always note that players with same team name are considered the same team
point - Point allocated to this player
buyAtkNames - Simple class names of the moves that the player buys
Throws:
BattleSysException - When one of the move names specified in buyAtkNames does not exist
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the point allocated is not sufficient to buy all move listed in buyAtkNames
InvalidMoveNameException
NotEnoughPointsException
UnbuyableMoveException

AnalysisPlayer

public AnalysisPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String teamName,
                      int point,
                      int maxAtkBuy,
                      double noMoveProb,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> chooseFromMove)
               throws InvalidMoveNameException,
                      NotEnoughPointsException,
                      UnbuyableMoveException
Generate a player

Parameters:
name - Name of the player
teamName - Team name of the player. Always note that players with same team name are considered the same team
point - Point allocated to this player
maxAtkBuy - Maximum number of attacks to buy
noMoveProb - Probability of this player getting no moves
chooseFromMove - List of moves (names, specified using their simple class name) that the player can choose from
Throws:
InvalidMoveNameException - Thrown when move names specifed in chooseFromMove does not exist.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the moves that can choose from contains not buyable moves or moves that the given point is not sufficient to buy.
NotEnoughPointsException
UnbuyableMoveException

Parameters:
name - Name of the player
teamName - Team name of the player. Always note that players with same team name are considered the same team
loPt - Lower bound of point allocated to this player
hiPt - Upper bound of point allocated to this player
maxAtkBuy - Maximum number of attacks to buy
noMoveProb - Probability of this player getting no moves
chooseFromMove - List of moves (names, specified using their simple class name) that the player can choose from
Throws:
BattleSysException - Thrown when move names specifed in chooseFromMove does not exist.

                           throws BattleSysException
Description copied from class: Player
Do a player move.

Overrides:
move in class Player
Parameters:
thisPlayers - Player data of all players in the same team
opposingPlayers - Player data of all the opposing players
round - The number of round it has been
battleNo - How many battles have been played for this player from the beginning of this replay
reResult - Random Event Result of the last Random event
mResult - The result of the opponent's last move
Returns:
List of Move Results returned by the useMove method
Throws:
BattleSysException
